__TOC__

Uses Nforce 630a Chipset. No on-board VGA.

Product page:
http://www.asus.com/product.aspx?P_ID=iDZQ9yNK2CbKW6Zv

== Jaunty Jackalope ==

=== i386 ===
The following work out of the box:
* SATA (AHCI) Controller
* PATA Controller
* Floppy Interface
* PCI-E x16
* PCI-E x1
* PCI Slots
* On-board LAN
* PS/2 Ports
* USB ports
* Parallel Ports
* Serial Ports
* PC Speaker

The Following don't work and ASUS's provided drivers don't seem to work:
* All VIA on-board Sound
* S/PDIF Out

* Note: I haven't tested the SATA Controller in RAID Mode.

=== AMD64 ===
The following work out of the box:
* SATA (AHCI) Controller
* PATA Controller
* Floppy Interface
* PCI-E x16
* PCI-E x1
* PCI Slots
* On-board LAN
* PS/2 Ports
* USB ports
* Parallel Ports
* Serial Ports
* PC Speaker

The following do seem to partially work but VERY temperamentally:
* On-board VIA Sound: Back Sound Out (OSS) - 2.0 Speakers only. 

The Following don't work and ASUS's provided drivers don't seem to work:
* On-board VIA Sound: Back sound Out 2.1, 4.0, 4.1, 5.1 or 7.1 speaker system
* On-board VIA Sound: Back Line In
* On-board VIA Sound: Front Sound Out
* On-board VIA Sound: Front Line In
* S/PDIF Out

* Note: I haven't tested the SATA Controller in RAID Mode.
